entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:56 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
